title: Utilizing Emotion Analysis in Online Education: Strategies for Evaluating Teaching Effectiveness

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Asynchronous BYOD-based course aimed at enhancing online class quality management competencies for social studies teachers

learning_goals: Learners can process online lecture evaluation text data with sentiment analysis tools to identify 20 positive/negative keywords
Learners can propose three improvement strategies for online classes based on analytical results.
Learners can write instructional effectiveness diagnostic reports using sentiment analysis reports.

resources: LMS platform (bulletin board, quiz, assignment submission features)
Demo Version of Sentiment Analysis Web Tool
Sample Online Lecture Evaluation Text Dataset

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
